sentences.english: Next, an analysis of Professor Hsiao's commentary style in annotating lyric is followed, so as to see his great learning and personality.

sentences.english: The staff handles the application of starting-up business in Beijing for the overseas Chinese students.

sentences.english: Beijing authority funds prior sci-tech programs led by the overseas Chinese talents every year.
